website_summaries.verdict: These soft rubber sticks have weighted plastic tips, so they stand upright, just waiting for little hands to grab.
pros: 5 soft, flexible rubber sticks with weighted plastic tips
Sticks are colorful and stand upright
Great for little hands to grab, since they stand upright and have a soft texture
Numbers on the sticks let you invent games
cons: May have a strong chemical odor when you first open the package
Lightweight, so currents can carry them across the bottom of the pool

customer_reviews.title: Our grandkids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids (ages to 12) love these so much we've ordered a second set. The are made of a soft, pliable, rubbery material with no sharp edges. They are a little slow to sink but not terribly slow. When they do sink they stand on one end so they are easy to grab. I think anyone would be happy with these diving toys.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: We ordered more for friends
customer_reviews.text: These pool toys were of excellent quality, and have held up to extensive use throughout the summer. They were so loved by friends that we ordered more for friends that asked about them. They still look and function just the same as the first time we got them out of the package, and we feel like they will last for many more summers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandson, he loves them. I haven't had them long so not sure about durability, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Need supervision to use these for inexperienced swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Great for swimming practice for children age 6+ who are carefully supervised by adults. These sink to the bottom of pool so I don't recommend throwing them in too deep but maybe 3' for beginner swimmers and children under 8 years old and inexperienced swimmers. I let my grandson swim after them one at a time as there is a set of 5 but you only need one really.
customer_reviews.author: lisa cardon

customer_reviews.title: Each stick is a different weight
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be fairly well-made. The only complaint I had was that they are actually different weights. From 10 g up to 50 g in 10 g increments. Bought these since I have three kids and thought I would each give them one. The problem is the sticks don’t all act the same when they sink
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Pool Fun
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting after reading the reviews. The play sticks are bendable - and weighted differently. This doesn’t hinder all the fun my kids are having with them though. The lighter weights sinking slower actually helps my younger child who can’t swim as fast or deep.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Description - This is NOT 3 shovels. It is a shovel, rake and broom.
customer_reviews.text: Description and picture implies that you are getting 3 shovels. Instead you are getting a shovel, broom, and rake. A decent set if that is what you are looking for. However I was wanting 3 shovels for the beach. A broom is not exactly useful for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Otte

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed product that was an instant hit with a 4-year old kid. It is amazing how they always stand vertically on the same end at the bottom of the pool making it easy to find and grab. As other reviewers have pointed out, there is an awful chemical odor when you open the package, but it dissipated quickly after one use in a chlorinated swimming pool :-) Hope the people who work in the factory are wearing gas masks.
customer_reviews.author: Sidd

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for little hands to hold!
customer_reviews.text: So fun!. My son loves them!. They got him to be a little less scared in the water!. Very easy for his little hands to hold, and they seem very durable!. Would definitely buy them again, very good quality!.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves playing with these in the pool! He can throw them easily and he can reach for them on the pool steps! Great for getting your child acclimated to getting their face near water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a weekend away with the grandkids. I'm not sure HOW they stand up under water but they do, and were great for building 'diving' confidence for new swimmers (vs something that lays on the bottom). Also, the littler kids could easily grab them with their feet. Fun times!
customer_reviews.author: P. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Counting games
customer_reviews.text: These diving sticks are easy for the kids to grab from the bottom of the pool. The numbering system allows for some fun counting games especially since they are out of school
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for in a diving toy for or my 6 year old. They are durable, sink quickly and stand straight up on the bottom of the pool. Colors are bright, and made of a soft thick rubber-like material. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: shawn brown

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I expected a product that is pleasing to the touch and to the eye. These stand up nicely at the bottom of the pool and their bright colors make them easy to spot. They are flexible and have drainage holes. I have used them many times already. I am very happy with this product. They seem like good quality. No complaints. They have a texture that makes them easy and comfortable to hold and grab onto.
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Kids love playing with these
customer_reviews.text: Kids love playing with these in the pool. I'm using them to help teach my 5 year old to dive and swim under water. We use the numbers on the ends as a point system and he needs to bring them back to me in numerical order. It's one of his favorite games to play at the pool other than "Dad throw me in". Seem to be FAR more durable than the last ones I had. There is a strong chemical smell when first opened, but it goes away the first time we used them in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: its a dog toy too!
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for my dog to give him something besides rocks to dig out of the lake. I tied 3 together to make it a little easier for him to pick up. He loves them. My cousin's dog is also a fan, as they both have their own way of fetching them off the bottom - my dog digs, and their dog dives down to the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: They are easier than the dive rings. The sort of float standing up so easier for the kids to grab onto. Better than the dive rings.
customer_reviews.author: nursemama4

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these diving sticks. They are very durable and he loves that they stand up under water. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aly Garner

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pool toy
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using dive sticks when I was a kid. I bought some for the kids to use now and they love it. It is a great exercise and a challenge for them.
customer_reviews.author: LOVETHEBEACH21

customer_reviews.title: I got lucky they actually have the numbers on them because my kids are so competitive they like to add up their points when they're done can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for stocking stuffers for my kids..I got lucky they actually have the numbers on them because my kids are so competitive they like to add up their points when they're done can't wait to get some use out of them this Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Pool dive toys
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He plays with them regularly!! They stand up in the pools at the bottom so super easy to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hussaini

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toys.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for training my two year old to dive down and retrieve them from the bottom of the pool. The bright colors make them easy to see, and since they always stand vertically on the bottom they present a perfect target for 'swipes' made by little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Wachter

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the pool. My kids love these because they stand up and are easy to see and grab.
customer_reviews.author: Felterstuff

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves them
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and easy to hold! My toddler loves them, colors are vibrant and grip is perfect for little chubby hands.
customer_reviews.author: Annaelle

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these and they help him become a stronger swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercupdawn

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted the summer with lots of tossing in the pool. We make sure not to toss them on the concrete so they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio White

customer_reviews.title: Pool fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. They sink quickly and are weighted on one end so they stand straight up. They didn't move around on the floor of the pool. They also had number scores on the end of each stick. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shank

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for children of all ages!! Well made, colorful, easy for little hands to hold onto. My 6 yr old granddaughter played with these for 3 straight hours! Don't hesitate to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rita s.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, not hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are not hard plastic since kids can get crazy and toss them around. They sink but remain upright, perfect for grabbing.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has learned on her own to swim underwater by practicing using these sticks. She LOVES them and became completely unafraid of going underwater when we bought these. I have been in the water teaching her swimming for a while to get accustomed, but this broke the final barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality & Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. These have lasted through several summers now. Kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: tpandc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great vibrant colors and a great addition to our pool toy collection. My 1 year old loves to chew on them and my 3 year old likes to put on goggles and point them out at the bottom of the pool so mom or dad can dive down and get them. They sink well but not too quickly. (if you accidently drop one of them it is easily retrievable while on the way down), They will grow with my kids, as they have endless uses from chew toy to actually diving toy.
customer_reviews.author: LittleLadyMel

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I love these dive sticks. They are weighted properly and do stand up in the water to make grabbing easy. However, my only complaint is that the holes that allow it to stand up, also makes them moving targets. I will put them down somewhere, and some minutes later, they are in the opposite end of the pool! If you don't mind moving targets, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: oktravelchick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect learning tools.
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use. Grandaughter learning to go deeper. These will help her!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old LOVES these sticks.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old LOVES these sticks. It helps him with practicing his shallow diving and holding his breath. I have no idea how it stands up in the water but it does each and every time which makes it very easy for the kiddies with small hands to grab them. The price is great too since you are getting 5 sticks for around $10. We've only used the darker colors in the pool and they were very easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toys for active kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool toys for kids who love to dive down to the bottom on the pool to retrieve items. Sticks sink to the bottom and stay vertical on the bottom, so very easy to retrieve. Guaranteed hours of enjoyment with my 9 yr old!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is good quality, perfect for pool play; my grandson loves it. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RV nut

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it at the pool with my 7 year old and he loves them! Sturdy, and overall good quality. I’ve seen some that are more expensive and am glad I chose this!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very good underwater sticks.
customer_reviews.text: I like this sticks. My kid played before with them on community pool, so I decided to bought them. Stay vertical under water, so easy to find on long distances. Very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro Turchenko

customer_reviews.title: Sinks pretty slowly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as designed and intended. 4 stars because it's very light, so it sinks pretty slowly compared to how you'd expect. Kids may be expecting these to be a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Argorlan

customer_reviews.title: great Deals for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love diving for these sticks. Being very colorful helps you find them anywhere . Great price fast shipping the perfect product for kids in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: hairbear2012

customer_reviews.title: good diving toy
customer_reviews.text: good bright colors, basic dive toy, water drains easily for storage
customer_reviews.author: ebr

customer_reviews.title: Not just fun for kids, but for adults, too!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoyed playing with these in the deep end of the pool, using our snorkel equipment so my husband can get more comfortable with swimming and adjusting ear pressure in deep water - in preparation for upcoming trips to snorkel in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these diving sticks to add a bit of fun to the pool time. The sticks sink relatively fast and the colors allow them to be easily spotted. The ends do pop off so make sure to really push the ends back in so the stick will still sink. Overall we would recommend them and have found them to be a fun addition to the pool activities.
customer_reviews.author: MWM

customer_reviews.title: They work good
customer_reviews.text: They work like they say. They sink and are tough.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool/toy for teaching my toddler grand babies to simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Update- they did arrive on time. Great tool/toy for teaching my toddler grand babies to simply get comfortable putting face in water while they sit on the pool steps until their ready to for them in deeper water. Baby steps.
customer_reviews.author: LACheerful

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They stand upright on the bottom of the pool and are great fun to throw in the water. The kids love diving down and grabbing them up! They are made of a rubber-like material with hard plastic ends. I am ordering another set as the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Play Sticks
customer_reviews.text: TOO much fun with these - while training toddler to swim. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Solid pool toy that should last
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a pool toy that would encourage the kids to try and swim deeper. This is a great toy for that. We also spread them out in different areas of the pools and compete on how many each of us can retrieve on a single breathe. The kids are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. thixton

customer_reviews.title: Kids dive sticks that work all summer long.
customer_reviews.text: allowed kids to dive and learn to swim under water. Sturdy and did not brake will continual use. Easy to clean, and mildew resistant.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: The ends are very dangerous. They are hard and if it hits someone, it WILL HURT THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Work great. Durable. Sink quick. Love the points in them. Soft and bendy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Good Dive Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Good dive sticks. The y take their time getting to the bottom and stand up when on the bottom which makes it easier for beginners to grasp them.
customer_reviews.author: Deem

customer_reviews.title: They take for ever to sink...
customer_reviews.text: I guess that might be a positive in some occasion but for our 2 years old, it's just way to long. There is hole on the stick which makes it slow. She loses interest before it hits the bottom of the pool. I like that they stay up though. I can see that once she is older, she will like that and won't mind the extra waiting time. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: kathe82

customer_reviews.title: Great diving sticks for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these diving sticks for my budding swimmer and they are so far his favorite thing about summer. They sink at a nice pace so he can grab them on his way down, but they don't linger and bob too long making them fun. The are also very SOFT so his little sister doesn't get hurt when she gets in the path of one of his throws. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We love these. They do stand up on the bottom of the pool as promised. My girls are little (2&4) and just like to grab them from shallower water (helps them learn to put their face in the water) but the big kids at the pool had fun throwing them all in the pool and getting points for finding them.
customer_reviews.author: VancouverMom

customer_reviews.title: Swim toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought for niece as that is what swim teacher uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Got my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter swimming. She started going face first to grab the sticks (which hit bottom but stand up) and then threw them out farther until she was swimming. Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: acarline

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: These dive sticks are really nice. These are prefect, colorful and fun. My daughters are just learning how to swim and they love to swim underwater to retrieve them. great for building their swimming ability
customer_reviews.author: Detroit mom

customer_reviews.title: Dive Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: This kids all like these diving sticks. They are colorful and easy to see in the pool. They sink down slowly, and sometimes they drift a little, so it's fun to hunt for them. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have numbers on top
customer_reviews.text: These do not topple over once at the bottom of the pool. There are numbers on the capped end for scoring a game! Seem made from quality materials, seem like they will hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun pool sticks
customer_reviews.text: These are great pool sticks for the kids. It's good how they stand up, so it's not as hard for my boys to grab. My son is learning to go under water, and these are fun for him. They love playing with these.
customer_reviews.author: 4fam

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I have had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our friend's daughter. She loves them! They're different from other kids since hers somewhat float and there are numbers on them to make more of a competition.
customer_reviews.author: adnama585

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these. They throw them around in the pool and have races to retrieve them. These really saw a lot of action and they still look the same as when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my godson who's 6 years old. One of his favorite toys for the pool this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Great dive sticks that sink quickly.  Helps kids who are afraid to go underwater.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for the kids. Really helped my daughter start diving under daughter and getting used to swimming underwater better. Sink quickly. Have been great. My daughter was somewhat afraid to swim under the water. However, the excitement to get the sticks overwhelmed the fear.
customer_reviews.author: utahphil

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo Godson loved diving for them in our pool. They were easier for him to grab since they stand up straight, at the bottom of the pool, rather than laying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fun for diving, my 8 and 5 year olds love playing with these in the pool. Even my 1 & 1/2 year old likes to through them in the pool and watch me or them dive down to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson swim class uses these. Kids love the light. So we bought some for our pool. They have to fill with water from the little hole to light up. Great at night fall too
customer_reviews.author: Ginger porter

customer_reviews.title: Kids love diving sticks!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sink pretty quickly, my kids love them. they are labelled 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 on the ends and I get them to search for the number I call. I'm really happy with these, the longer part is sort of a bumpy wavy feeling and aren't totally smooth so that helps them grip them better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fromel

customer_reviews.title: Played with all summer
customer_reviews.text: The sticks work well, sink somewhat slowly. They have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great diving sticks
customer_reviews.text: Great diving sticks, my daughter loves them. Unlike others I've seen, these will always stay upright at the bottom, which is perfect for those just learning to dive.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sensale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grands love how they can dive down in the pool and get them
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These get my 5 year old to hold her breath way longer and dive down deeper! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ahlfs

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love em in the pool. They have point values assigned to each which makes for a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome underwater toy for turtles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 180 gallon turtle tank. Since the sticks automatically stand up, my 3 turtles love playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice dive sticks
customer_reviews.text: Nice package in good quality and my daughter loves to dive for these in the pool
customer_reviews.author: C LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: loads of fun in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun in the pool. Helps my son to not be afraid diving in the water and teaches him to hold breath in water. Lots of fun with friends in the pool diving for these sticks
customer_reviews.author: Treshawna-SG

customer_reviews.title: They stand up
customer_reviews.text: They stand up at the bottom of the pool, making it easy for little ones to dive and grab! Colorful and fun!
customer_reviews.author: E Grant

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love diving for these wands
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love diving for these wands. It is wonderful how they stand up for ease of finding them in the lake. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: durable and fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: <These are durable and just as described! When the grandkids use these, other kids gather around and want to join in....so there are always contests! The grandkids even want to put on goggles and play with them in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my dog to play with in the pool. They are great and he loves them .
customer_reviews.author: Sam F.

customer_reviews.title: fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: these are a little smelly when you get them. which is why i only gave 4 stars. i'm sure they are cheaply made. we've had them for awhile and they're still going strong. fun for my 5 year old to dive for in the pool. worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Denmark

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them. They are a little slow to sink ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them. They are a little slow to sink but that's OK. They stand up well and are easy to dive for.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite pool toy for my kids & most friends that come over to swim!
customer_reviews.author: JRMom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great pool fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday party as favors for her guests. They had great fun diving for these. They landed nicely in the pool and are easy to grab and then toss again. Bright colors, it does have "points" on the ends but they weren't even paying attention to those. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyomi

customer_reviews.title: Little Divers Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These brightly colored dive sticks were a real hit with my grandchildren. They are durable, eye-catching, and easy to locate underwater. So far, there has been no fading from the pool chlorine, which was an issue with prior dive toys.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Rae

customer_reviews.title: Soft, flexible, & sturdy diving toys!
customer_reviews.text: The sticks sink quickly & stand up for easy retrieval. They are great for my almost 4 year old granddaughter to practice diving.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Easy to grab underwater and tries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say, they sink to the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, they sink to the bottom of the pool as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: writing titles is the hardest part of a review
customer_reviews.text: 5 of these for $6 is a pretty good deal. For some reason, I think that someone will impale themselves with them, since they aren't round like the rings. But they seem pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: TitleWriter

customer_reviews.title: I like that they "sit up" at the bottom of the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are actually pliant, which was a pleasant surprise. I like that they "sit up" at the bottom of the pool (rather than lay flat). Kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: travelingbean

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a vacation
customer_reviews.text: Took these on vacation and they were easy to pack . Came in handy at resort pool. The kids loved playing with them. Will use them in the lake this summer since colors are nice and bright and they have some heft to them.
customer_reviews.author: swmetz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but perfect for one summer.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Somewhat cheaply made. Will probably only last one swim season. Will have to replace next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: fun in shallow water, too!
customer_reviews.text: There sticks stand on end in the water, making them fun to retrieve, and my 3 year old grand-niece even likes to "dive" for them in our hot tub! The plastic is not hard, but pliable, so they won't crack if they are stepped on or dropped.
customer_reviews.author: life-long learner

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a water dog and I use these for her. She loves them and they are not hard, so if she gets hit with one they dont hurt!
customer_reviews.author: shannon e.

customer_reviews.title: makes a splash!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping & very colorful! My 6 year old loved diving for them & the fact they have points on them just made her games with her friends that much more entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The have been used at the lake too their bright colors make them easy to find
customer_reviews.text: My kids used these things for hours in the pool on vacation. Small enough to pack in our luggage, big enough to find in the pool! Made of hard rubber very durable should last quite a while. The have been used at the lake too their bright colors make them easy to find. The sticks stay upright at the bottom of the pool as I hoped they would.
customer_reviews.author: Koehn Manthei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a toy for my fish. She seems to enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amber Leigh
